verse: An oracle concerning the Valley of Vision:
You observed that there were many breaches in the City of David, and you collected the waters of the lower pool.
You counted the buildings in Jerusalem, and you tore down some to strengthen the wall.
Between the two walls you constructed a reservoir for the water of the old pool. But you did not look to the cityâ€™s Maker or give a thought to him who built it long ago.
Then the Lord of hosts revealed this to me:
Thus says the Lord God of hosts:
